ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: well i went to a lone server that i do not use and did the rundown on all the clerics, here is what i found; Dark elfs-base-118 Dwarfs-base-118
ygData.messageBody:
well i went to a lone server that i do not use and did the rundown on all
the clerics, here is what i found;
Dark elfs-base-118
Dwarfs-base-118
Eridites-base-118
Gnome-base-102
Halfling-base-115
Humans-base-110, and the all ellusive, all powerfull
High Elfs-base-130
this is with putting all yer points into wisdom, when this is done you are
left with 5 points, which i put into str, so you see if ya put all points
into wis then you can perty much start out with fairly high wis. I did not
when i first made my human cleric, who btw is now lvl 25-but alas she is not
very wise as i made her all wrong =0(, therefore i think she will suck at
higher lvls as far as having enough manna to heal effectively, adira and i
know eachother and i am always amazed at how many heals and buffs she can
get off as opposed to how few i can in comparision. oh well hindsight always
hurts LOL
All i am saying is stand tall, be proud, and do your best--Adira was right
the cleric is not the way to go for all ppl. then again there are lots of
wis items out there and for me this is what i have to do, so far i am
wearing a savants cap, a BS tunic, wis rings and earrings, and im just
barely above 105 lol but i work my butt off to keep ppl alive i love my
cleric best and know there are many items out there to bring my wis up so...
have fun with the toon thats what is most important anyway!! =0)
